title: SB 1186
content: The people of the State of California enact the following. The sum of $647,443.32 is appropriated to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for payment of accepted claims from specified funds. The schedule for payment includes allocations from various funds such as the General Fund and specific budget programs. The Controller is required to transfer surcharges and fees to support board reimbursements as requested by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The transferred amount should not exceed the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code. The board must report the recovered amounts to the Department of Finance within 90 days. The board shall transfer funds for board reimbursements to Item 7870-001-0001 of the Budget Act of 2016 and report the recovered amounts to the Department of Finance within 90 days. The General Fund appropriates funds to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for the payment of claims accepted by the board and reported to the Legislature. The General Fund appropriates funds to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for specific claim payments: $512,600 for Timothy Gantt, $654,500 for Marco Milla, and $762,440 for Larry Pohlschneider. The General Fund appropriates $936,880 to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for Luther Ed Jones, Jr.'s claim. This act is an urgency statute for immediate payment of claims to end hardship for claimants.
